price: Mbere yanyu hagiye habaho ingero (z’ibyabaye ku bababanjirije). Ngaho nimutambagire isi maze murebe uko iherezo ry’abahakanye ryagenze.
arabic: قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ سُنَنٞ فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qad khalat min qablikum sunanun fasīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
